summary: Business dashboard app with RB order splitting and status filtering. Current focus: fixing Karigar/generic name display issue introduced in Version 41
architectural_notes: Dashboard displays orders with Karigar names and generic names across different tabs
Version 41 introduced RB order splitting by supplied quantity and status-based filtering (Ready tab)
Orders are filtered and displayed in Total Orders and Ready Orders tabs with quantity-based logic
known_issues: Karigar names and generic names not displaying correctly in Version 41 dashboard (worked in Version 35)
Issue likely caused by order filtering/splitting logic in V41 not preserving name fields

existing_features.title: Verify that RB order splitting logic (when marking orders as ready with supplied quantities) preserves karigarName and genericName in both original and newly created order records

new_feature_requests.summary: Ensure Karigar names (karigarName field) display correctly in all dashboard tabs (Total Orders, Ready Orders, Hallmark Orders, Customer Orders) when rendering order rows in OrderTable component
Ensure generic names (genericName field) display correctly in all dashboard tabs when rendering order rows in OrderTable component
Verify that order filtering logic in TotalOrdersTab and ReadyTab preserves karigarName and genericName fields when filtering by status, order type, or karigar selection
